lan_mode.title: Currently in LAN Gaming Mode

lan_mode.detailed_message:
LAN gaming feature is currently active.

To avoid game connection interruption, please exit LAN gaming mode before closing the application.

Steps:
1. Switch to„ÄåLAN Gaming„Äçpage
2. Click„ÄåExit Gaming„Äçbutton
3. Wait for exit to complete, then close the application

network_running.title: Network is Running
network_running.message:
Your virtual LAN is currently running.

Closing the application will:
‚Ä¢ Disconnect virtual network
‚Ä¢ Affect ongoing gaming sessions

Please stop the network before closing.
network_running.detailed_message:
Your virtual LAN is currently running.

To avoid abnormal network disconnection, please stop the network before closing the application.

Steps:
1. Switch to„ÄåVirtual LAN„Äçpage
2. Click„ÄåStop Network„Äçbutton
3. Wait for network to stop, then close the application
